Uses of Package
org.opensaml.security.credential

  • Packages that use org.opensaml.security.credential 
    Package Description
    org.opensaml.security.credential
    Interfaces and classes related to credentials and ways to represent them.
    org.opensaml.security.criteria
    Classes which model lookup criteria used as input to a Resolver.
    org.opensaml.security.crypto
    General cryptographic functionality.
    org.opensaml.security.messaging
    Messaging-related security classes.
    org.opensaml.security.trust
    Interfaces and classes used to evaluate the trustworthiness and validity of Credentials.
    org.opensaml.security.x509
    X.509-based credential and trust classes.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.credential 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCredential
    Base class for Credential implementations.
    BasicCredential
    A basic implementation of Credential.
    Credential
    A credential for an entity.
    CredentialContextSet
    This class holds instances of CredentialContext which represent information about the context in which a CredentialResolver has resolved a Credential.
    MutableCredential
    A specialization of Credential which supports mutation of its properties.
    UsageType
    Credential usage types.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.criteria 
    Class and Description
    UsageType
    Credential usage types.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.crypto 
    Class and Description
    Credential
    A credential for an entity.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.messaging 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCredential
    Base class for Credential implementations.
    Credential
    A credential for an entity.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.trust 
    Class and Description
    CredentialResolver
    A resolver which uses Criterion to resolve and return instances of Credential.
  • Classes in org.opensaml.security.credential used by org.opensaml.security.x509 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCredential
    Base class for Credential implementations.
    BasicCredential
    A basic implementation of Credential.
    Credential
    A credential for an entity.
    MutableCredential
    A specialization of Credential which supports mutation of its properties.
